result.reason: Bulk editing is a standard productivity feature; implementation leverages the PropertyGrid's built-in support for multiple objects.
result.approach: Enable multi-select in the connection tree component. Update the selection change listener to pass the array of selected connection info objects to the `PropertyGrid.SelectedObjects` property (instead of `SelectedObject`), enabling automatic intersection and bulk editing of shared properties.
